title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Donate
body: Donate       Thank you for your interest in supporting the George Washington Memorial Parkway. Your donation will enhance programs and activities that protect park resources and provide visitor services. Donations can be sent directly to the National Park Foundation at: 1201 Eye Street, NW, Suite 550B Washington, DC 20005 Phone: (202) 354-6460 Chartered by Congress in 1967, the National Park Foundation is founded on a legacy that began more than a century ago, when private citizens from all walks of life took action to establish and protect our national parks. Today, the National Park Foundation carries on that tradition as the only national charitable nonprofit whose sole mission is to directly support the National Park Service.
